backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing background image and audio replacement mappings and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom CSS variables for themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Guide explaining how to replace the three background images and background music by overwriting generated asset files with the same filenames.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages with persistent BackgroundAudioProvider.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports fixed paths for the three background images and background music file.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Creates and manages a single looping audio element that attempts autoplay and persists across navigation.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Renders full-screen letterboxed background images with a dark overlay behind page content.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Stylized romantic-themed button component with hover scaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored sessions, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, custom fonts, and utility animations for fade‑in and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Renders the final message page with a full‑screen background, fade‑in text, scrollable content, and a signature overlay.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Shows the intro screen with a title, paragraph, background image, delayed CTA, and navigation to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Displays the marriage proposal text with a background and a button that navigates to the final page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended OKLCH color mappings, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current multi‑page romantic experience, requirements, architecture notes, and feature tracking metadata.
